org.jclouds.cloudstack.features
Interface GlobalOfferingApi

All Superinterfaces:
GlobalOfferingClient, OfferingApi, OfferingClient
public interface GlobalOfferingApi
extends GlobalOfferingClient, OfferingApi

Provides synchronous access to CloudStack Offering features.

Note that this class is transitionary and will fully replace GlobalOfferingClient in 1.7.

Author:
Adrian Cole
See Also:
